Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Philadelphia Airport Courtyard by Marriott in Philadelphia (Eastwick), you'll be close to John Heinz National Wildlife Refuge at Tinicum and Fort Mifflin. This family-friendly hotel is within the vicinity of Simeone Foundation Museum and Bartram's Garden.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 152 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature shower/tub combinations, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as complimentary weekday newspapers and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Don’t miss out on recreational opportunities including an indoor pool and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided at no charge.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

John Heinz National Wildlife Refuge at Tinicum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Fort Mifflin - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Simeone Foundation Museum - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Bartram's Garden - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Wells Fargo Center - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Lincoln Financial Field - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Rocky Statue - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Citizens Bank Park - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi

H. Hunter Lott Jr. Tennis Courts - 8.8 km / 5.4 mi
Institute of Contemporary Art - 8.8 km / 5.5 mi
Marian Anderson Historical Residence & Museum - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi

The preferred airport for Philadelphia Airport Courtyard by Marriott is Philadelphia, PA (PHL-Philadelphia Intl.) - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
